item.title: 25 Jan 2022 12:25
item.description:
Setup a https://t.co/uKMzPxg3wd instance today and blown away by the simplicity of getting this all up and running! Wish I’d done this several months back when I moved (most of) my family away from whatsapp. https://t.co/bZcvw7lVas

Link to Tweet
